channel.title: Furkan Eşref Yazıcı’s Blog
channel.description: Furkan Eşref Yazıcı's personal website. I write about web development, software engineering, and other things I find interesting.

item.title: Hello and Welcome!
item.description: Hello folks, I am Furkan and this is my blog for my technical life journey - I have another general thoughts blog too I will share this later.
